title: Soul Sparkle Holiday Soiree and Collection Launch Celebration
desc:
Come celebrate the holidays SOUL SPARKLE style with this Holiday Soiree and Launch Party for the private labeled Soul Sparkle Collection. So excited to share this sweet dream come true with you!!  
 This collection has been birthed with so much love and the proceeds from this event and the collection will be donated to support economic development for women through our non profit partner and the MisFit Foundation. Please bring a friend and join us at the beautiful Hudson Hotel for a champagne toast and a very special Soul Sparkle surprise!? With love and magic! xo
